Angelica Dismas

Rib Cage - Matilda Cole (Visualizer)

The visualizer for indie pop artist Matilda Cole�s �Rib Cage�, from her EP Pomegranate, translates the song�s raw reflection on girlhood, legacy, and emotional inheritance into a dreamlike visual loop. Caught between innocence and transformation, the mixed media animation mirrors the inner struggles and cyclical nature of healing. Subtly inspired by the myth of Persephone, it explores descent and return through tarot-inspired cards that guide a symbolic journey through identity and womanhood.
